name: Hotel Room 123
description: The room embodies 'adequate' with a passion bordering on art form. A bed of ambiguous comfort squats against one wall, covered in a quilt featuring geometric patterns that induce mild hypnosis. The wallpaper depicts repeating scenes of clouds that are either peaceful or deeply menacing depending on your current state of mind. A mirror on the wall reflects you with unflinching honesty.

features.mirror: A wall-mounted mirror that reflects you with unflinching honesty. This is you at 3 AM. This is you with hotel lighting. This is truth.
features.wallpaper: Endless clouds drifting across a beige sky. They look peaceful at first. Then you start to notice the faces. There are no faces. Are there? Stop looking at the wallpaper.
